body_html:
I see it. I'm ok with changes to the _nd versions.

I see it. I'm ok with changes to the _nd versions.

body:
I see it. I'm ok with changes to the _nd versions.

On Oct 1, 2017 3:16 AM, "Daniyar Turmukhambetov" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> I'm working with the master branch,
> int32/int64 are not supported:

> tensorflow/core/kernels/gather_nd_op_gpu.cu.cc#L120
>

> tensorflow/core/kernels/gather_nd_op.cc#L227
